item.title: Changeset [530]: Initial import of Smarty Template Support. Some of the WP template api ...
item.dc:creator: donncha
item.description: Initial import of Smarty Template Support. Some of the WP template api has been wrapped in Smarty function calls. Added a Smartyised template of the default theme. A plugin directory has been created for Smarty plugins. Read wp-sitetemplates/readme.html for further information.
